Q_DESC:
In India, it is customary to welcome all guests who come to our house. Amphisoft comes out with a new type of personalized doorbell software which would ask the visitor to tell his/her name when they press the calling bell. The inbuilt voice recognition system in the software would convert their voice to text and it would form a new text message combining the welcome message along with the name and text would be converted to voice and the door bells tune would be the text.
The technical architect of Amphisoft always values the students programming skills and he asks you to implement a part of the project.
Create a class named Vistor. Include three private data members named (strings),gender(char) and age(int).include functions named .
Initialized Data in this function get the values of all the three dta members from the user.
DisplayData-in this function display the personalized welcome message.(based on gender(M/F) and based on Age[less than 10 or more]

Input:-
Three space seperated Enter your name,Enter the gender M/m F/f , Enter your age.
TESTCASE_1:
kumar  m 56
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Welcome Mr. kumar please wait for a minute
TESTCASE_2:
Srilatha  F  5
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Welcome Ms. Srilatha please wait for a minute
TESTCASE_3:
Srinaina  F  35
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Welcome Mrs. Srinaina please wait for a minute
TESTCASE_4:
Mohit  m  4
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Welcome Master Mohit please wait for a minute
